channel.title: My Melee Is Ruined - Can Anyone Help?
channel.description:
I think I messed around with my combat too much a while back, can someone really help me and give me any pieces of client.java that relate to melee combat. The last thing I remember was making both players face each other, so if you can find that in your client.java, can you give me the code around it?
I use a Phonescape source, but if it still works I'll use any other.

item.title: My Melee Is Ruined - Can Anyone Help?
item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

just download another phonescape source then u have the origianl client.java then u can see wt is wrong

Read full topic
